items.text_for_match: Palace sign Strand Larsen in deal worth up to £48m but McNeil loan off Crystal Palace sign striker Jorgen Strand Larsen from Wolves in a club-record deal worth up to £48m. Crystal Palace sign striker Jorgen Strand Larsen from Wolves in a club-record deal worth up to £48m.

items.ja: Phillips joins Sheffield United on loan - can he revive career?
items.en: Phillips joins Sheffield United on loan - can he revive career?
items.text_for_match: Phillips joins Sheffield United on loan - can he revive career? Sheffield United sign Manchester City midfielder Kalvin Phillips on loan for the remainder of the season. Sheffield United sign Manchester City midfielder Kalvin Phillips on loan for the remainder of the season.

items.text_for_match: Lookman joins Atletico - and will set new record Atletico Madrid sign Nigeria forward Ademola Lookman, 28, from Atalanta for £30.3m. Atletico Madrid sign Nigeria forward Ademola Lookman, 28, from Atalanta for £30.3m.
